events.name: China signs legal order for activities in disputed waters
events.wd_label: China signs legal order for activities in disputed waters
events.wd_description: President Xi of China signed a legal order allowing activities in disputed territorial waters, termed as "military activities other than war" by State Media.
events.description: President Xi of China signed a legal order allowing activities in disputed territorial waters, termed as "military activities other than war" by State Media.

events.name: China's claim to Taiwan Strait
events.wd_description: Chinese officials claimed sovereignty over the Taiwan Strait, accusing countries that see it as international waters of making false claims and threatening China's sovereignty.
events.description: Chinese officials claimed sovereignty over the Taiwan Strait, accusing countries that see it as international waters of making false claims and threatening China's sovereignty.

events.name: International navigation in Taiwan Strait
events.wd_description: Foreign nations have conducted freedom of navigation exercises in the Strait, sailing warships through the area and infuriating Beijing.
events.description: Foreign nations have conducted freedom of navigation exercises in the Strait, sailing warships through the area and infuriating Beijing.

events.name: US response to China's claim
events.wd_description: US State Department spokesperson Ned Price stated that the Strait is an international waterway with freedoms guaranteed by international law, and the US will continue to sail in accordance with international law.
events.description: US State Department spokesperson Ned Price stated that the Strait is an international waterway with freedoms guaranteed by international law, and the US will continue to sail in accordance with international law.

events.name: Record-breaking heatwave in Japan, June 2022
events.wd_description: Japan is experiencing its worst heatwave since records began in 1875, with temperatures exceeding 35°C in Tokyo for five consecutive days and a record high of 40.2°C in Isesaki, leading to government warnings and health concerns.
events.description: Japan is experiencing its worst heatwave since records began in 1875, with temperatures exceeding 35°C in Tokyo for five consecutive days and a record high of 40.2°C in Isesaki, leading to government warnings and health concerns.

events.name: Heatwave impact in Tokyo
events.wd_description: Tokyo experienced temperatures exceeding 35°C for five consecutive days, marking the worst heatwave in June since records began in 1875.
events.description: Tokyo experienced temperatures exceeding 35°C for five consecutive days, marking the worst heatwave in June since records began in 1875.

events.name: Record temperatures in Isesaki
events.wd_description: Isesaki, northwest of Tokyo, recorded a temperature of 40.2°C, the highest ever recorded in June in Japan.
events.description: Isesaki, northwest of Tokyo, recorded a temperature of 40.2°C, the highest ever recorded in June in Japan.

events.name: Government response and health advisories
events.wd_description: The government issued warnings about potential power outages and advised citizens to use air conditioning to prevent heatstroke, as hospitalizations increased with the ongoing heatwave.
events.description: The government issued warnings about potential power outages and advised citizens to use air conditioning to prevent heatstroke, as hospitalizations increased with the ongoing heatwave.

events.name: UK inflation rate increases to 9.1%
events.wd_description: The pace of price growth in the UK increased to 9.1% in May from 9% in April, driven primarily by the cost of fuel and energy, according to the Office for National Statistics (ONS).
events.description: The pace of price growth in the UK increased to 9.1% in May from 9% in April, driven primarily by the cost of fuel and energy, according to the Office for National Statistics (ONS).

events.name: Causes of inflation
events.wd_description: The main causes of inflation are the rising costs of fuel and energy.
events.description: The main causes of inflation are the rising costs of fuel and energy.

events.name: Workers and unions' response
events.wd_description: Workers and unions are fighting for pay increases to cope with rising prices.
events.description: Workers and unions are fighting for pay increases to cope with rising prices.

events.name: Government caution
events.wd_description: The government cautions against significant pay raises by employers to avoid an "inflationary spiral" similar to the 1970s.
events.description: The government cautions against significant pay raises by employers to avoid an "inflationary spiral" similar to the 1970s.

events.name: Bank of England's warning
events.wd_description: The Bank of England warned that inflation might hit 11 percent this year, the highest level since March 1982.
events.description: The Bank of England warned that inflation might hit 11 percent this year, the highest level since March 1982.

events.name: Experts' recommendation
events.wd_description: Experts suggest raising interest rates as a way to slow the rate of price growth by encouraging people to borrow less, spend less, and save more.
events.description: Experts suggest raising interest rates as a way to slow the rate of price growth by encouraging people to borrow less, spend less, and save more.

events.name: Indonesia Power Battery Industry Chain Project
events.wd_label: Indonesia Power Battery Industry Chain Project
events.wd_description: Guangdong Bangpu subsidiary Pukin Times, Indonesian PT Aneka Tambang (ANTAM), and PT Industri Baterai Indonesia (IBI) have signed a tripartite agreement to establish a power battery industry chain project in Indonesia.
events.description: Guangdong Bangpu subsidiary Pukin Times, Indonesian PT Aneka Tambang (ANTAM), and PT Industri Baterai Indonesia (IBI) have signed a tripartite agreement to establish a power battery industry chain project in Indonesia.

events.name: Project Investment
events.wd_description: The total investment amount of the project is nearly $60 billion, focusing on nickel mining and processing, battery materials, battery manufacturing, and battery recycling.
events.description: The total investment amount of the project is nearly $60 billion, focusing on nickel mining and processing, battery materials, battery manufacturing, and battery recycling.

events.name: Strategic Partnership
events.wd_description: The establishment of the tripartite partnership is an important milestone for CATL's global expansion and will promote the development of Indonesia's electric vehicle industry.
events.description: The establishment of the tripartite partnership is an important milestone for CATL's global expansion and will promote the development of Indonesia's electric vehicle industry.

events.name: Project Components
events.wd_description: The project includes nickel mining and smelting, battery materials, battery manufacturing, and battery recycling, to be developed in industrial parks in North Maluku Province and other related areas in Indonesia.
events.description: The project includes nickel mining and smelting, battery materials, battery manufacturing, and battery recycling, to be developed in industrial parks in North Maluku Province and other related areas in Indonesia.

events.name: Nickel Mining and Smelting
events.wd_description: The project involves the mining and smelting of nickel in the FHT industrial park and other related areas in North Maluku Province, Indonesia.
events.description: The project involves the mining and smelting of nickel in the FHT industrial park and other related areas in North Maluku Province, Indonesia.

events.name: Battery Materials
events.wd_description: The project focuses on the production of battery materials to support the power battery industry chain.
events.description: The project focuses on the production of battery materials to support the power battery industry chain.

events.name: Battery Manufacturing
events.wd_description: The project includes the manufacturing of batteries to be used in electric vehicles.
events.description: The project includes the manufacturing of batteries to be used in electric vehicles.

events.name: Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: The project aims to develop a battery recycling industry to ensure sustainable use of battery materials.
events.description: The project aims to develop a battery recycling industry to ensure sustainable use of battery materials.
